mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_MGNT_BASE ( BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_REGISTER_TIME ) values ( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_REGISTER_TIME from BOARD_MGNT_BASE
select BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_REGISTER_TIME from BOARD_MGNT_BASE where BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
